description.value:
You are trained in the way of a particular craft, and have likely made most of your living plying its trade. You may have been sculpted from a young age as an apprentice or taken up the art later in life. Either way, you have developed an eye for quality and the skills to fashion it.

Skill Proficiency: Pick one of the following: Craft, Culture, Investigation, Persuasion, or Sleight of Hand.

Trade Proficiency: Alchemy, Artisan (Choose any Specialization), Smithing, or Tinkering.

Background Feature: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.5Z5KEPS9RQKUVCPC]{Eye for Quality}

Equipment: A merchant's scale and one artisan kit you are proficient with (excluding the alchemy kit).
